channel.title: [Turbo] Jake's Test Turbo (Signups)
channel.description: # Welcome to Jake's First time hosting, please stand by. This is a Turbo game If you wish to Co-Host, you are welcome to do so. # Rules 1) Be Respectful at All Times 2) Do not, or attempt to, angleshoot. If you have reason to believe that you know someone’s alignment from out of game information, message the host and you will be replaced. 3) Do not weaponise the moderator. 4) Do not communicate in any threads not sanctioned by the host. 5) Follow the global forum rules. 6) Speak in English only. # Gameplay Day and Night are both 5 minutes. The [Scum] have a factional kill, and a factional chat on the forums. Lynches are Plurality and Majority. # Roles > # [color=green]Citizen[/color] (Town) > You have no abilities except your vote and voice. > *Eliminate all of the Mafia* > # [color=green]Sheriff[/color] (Town) > Every night, you may check a player to determine their faction. > *Eliminate all of the Mafia* > # [color=red]Mafia[/color] (Mafia) > You have a factional kill, a factional chat, and the ability to speak and vote. > Your Partners in crime are [X], [X], ... and [X] > *Eliminate all of the Town* # RoleList [color=green]Sheriff Citizen Citizen Citizen[/color] [color=red]Mafia Mafia[/color] # Players 1) 2) 3) 4) 5) 6)

item.title: [Turbo] Jake's Test Turbo (Signups)
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Welcome to Jake’s First time hosting, please stand by.

This is a Turbo game

If you wish to Co-Host, you are welcome to do so.

Rules

  1. Be Respectful at All Times
  2. Do not, or attempt to, angleshoot. If you have reason to believe that you know someone’s alignment from out of game information, message the host and you will be replaced.
  3. Do not weaponise the moderator.
  4. Do not communicate in any threads not sanctioned by the host.
  5. Follow the global forum rules.
  6. Speak in English only.

Gameplay

Day and Night are both 5 minutes.
The [Scum] have a factional kill, and a factional chat on the forums.
Lynches are Plurality and Majority.

Roles

Citizen (Town)

You have no abilities except your vote and voice.
Eliminate all of the Mafia

Sheriff (Town)

Every night, you may check a player to determine their faction.
Eliminate all of the Mafia

Mafia (Mafia)

You have a factional kill, a factional chat, and the ability to speak and vote.
Your Partners in crime are [X], [X], … and [X]
Eliminate all of the Town

RoleList

Sheriff
Citizen
Citizen
Citizen
Mafia
Mafia

Players

Read full topic
